body: UPDATE: I have results! apparently I had to open the idf with eplus and simulate, in order to create the .eio file! do I have to do this procedure everytime now? Thanks Abraham for you time and patience. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/8KOwdycLvXQuAh8IgtaFE6OjVDRvkenD3yJenD9BZAha41eMtGMv08s7OhmOZ727cqNrEHDrW55P2AeOyeyTXiLV3tClBZZW/newbc.JPG)
